skill.name: theme-handler
skill.description: Manage and update application themes using shadcn and tweakcn.
skill.summary: Manage and update application themes using shadcn and tweakcn.
skill.author: AayushBaniya2006

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based instruction skill. It provides guidance for installing UI themes using shadcn CLI. No code execution, no filesystem access, no network calls, and no environment variable access. The skill only contains documentation and example commands.

content.user_title: Install UI themes with shadcn and tweakcn
content.value_statement: Managing application themes manually requires finding theme URLs and running CLI commands. This skill provides a curated list of pre-configured themes and installation commands, making theme installation fast and error-free.
actual_capabilities: Lists 40+ curated themes from tweakcn library
Generates installation commands for shadcn CLI
Provides theme names and corresponding URLs
Supports modern design themes like Minimal, Cyberpunk, Neo Brutalism
limitations: Only supports themes from the tweakcn library
Requires pnpm and shadcn CLI to be installed
Does not apply themes automatically; user must run commands

use_cases.title: Apply pre-built themes
use_cases.description: Quickly browse and install curated themes for React applications using shadcn UI components.

use_cases.title: Rapid prototyping
use_cases.description: Apply professional themes instantly during prototyping without manual configuration.

best_practices: Preview themes at tweakcn.com before installing to ensure they match your design vision.
Test themes in a development environment before applying them to production.
Back up existing theme configuration files before making changes.
anti_patterns: Installing themes without previewing them first may result in mismatched design aesthetics.
Applying multiple themes simultaneously can cause conflicts and unexpected styling.
Skipping dependency installation (pnpm, shadcn CLI) will prevent theme commands from working.

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code through their skill invocation system.

faq.question: How many themes are available?
faq.answer: The skill includes 40+ themes including Modern Minimal, Cyberpunk, Claude, Vercel, and many more.

faq.question: Does this work with other package managers?
faq.answer: The skill uses pnpm commands. You may adapt the commands for npm or yarn if shadcn supports them.

faq.question: Is my data safe when installing themes?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill only provides instructions. The shadcn CLI fetches themes from tweakcn.com, a trusted source.

faq.question: Themes are not applying correctly. What should I do?
faq.answer: Verify pnpm and shadcn CLI are installed. Check your theme configuration files for conflicts. Restart your dev server.

faq.question: How is this different from manual theme installation?
faq.answer: This skill provides curated, tested theme URLs and ready-to-run commands, eliminating guesswork and configuration errors.
